content: Drilling stand DD-ST 22 110/150/160 SFL ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Compact and lightweight – designed for portability and easier setup Comprehensive range of accessories available – such as vacuum pads, jack screws, fastening kits, and water collector systems Easy set-up – tool-free quick-connection of drive unit Applications Drilling range up to 162 mm diameter without spacers Drilling range up to 6-3/8” diameter without spacers Can be fastened by anchor, using the optional vacuum pad or with the jack screw Compatible with the DD 150-U-22, DD 110-U-22, and the DD 160-22 Cordless core drill ### TECHNICAL DATA: Fixation mode: Anchor Angular coring: No Column extension: Yes Technical Data | Fixation mode | Anchor | Angular coring | No | Column extension | Yes | For use with | DD 110-U-22, DD 150-U, DD 150-U-22, DD 160-22 | Weight | 26.01 lb | Base plate dimensions (LxW) | 9 x 6.5 in | Drill Stand Height | 37.2 in ### ITEMS- 2347690 - Drilling stand DD-ST 22 110/150/160 SFL - Package Size 1 pc
